resources.string: The Robot RC app provides two components:

string-array.name: usecases
string-array.item: - ØMQ remote control features for robots. It connects to the robot and listens to incoming remote control commands over ØMQ. In return, the video stream received from the robot is sent over ØMQ. (To be used with the robot server found at https://github.com/eggerdo/robot_server.node).
- User interface to remote control a robot over ØMQ. Controls are sent over ØMQ to the robot server and the video stream is received and displayed on the screen.

resources.string: Chose one of the following robots to connect. Select \'remember choice\' if you want to connect automatically to this robot next time

string-array.name: changelog
string-array.item: - Initial release with Robots: Romo, AC13, Rover 2.0, I-Spy Tank
